website_summaries.verdict: Hatchimals CollEGGtibles in a basket are perfect for a special occasion gift.
pros: It comes with 2 hatched and 4 surprise unhatched animals
Cute spring basket that the Hatchimals can ride in
cons: This basket is not very big and may be smaller than you expect

customer_reviews.title: great to put in Easter basket
customer_reviews.text: Very cute....great to put in Easter basket. Has 4 eggs to hatch and 2 hatchimals already hatched for a total of 6 hatchimals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Easter!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute ..smaller then I thought..but my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: christina allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Easter
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, packaged well, no issues at all, my little one was SO excited, it became the "basket of treasures," and she couldnt 'hatch' the eggs fast enough-would recommend for any hatchimal collector!
customer_reviews.author: Kat_P

customer_reviews.title: Set seems incomplete
customer_reviews.text: There are 8 slots and only 6 hatchimals, so my child was frustrated that we couldnt fill in all the little slots. Other than that, it’s regular hatchimals toys - joy for 10 minutes max.
customer_reviews.author: Lilit

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Easter
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love hatchimals. This is a good gifting idea
customer_reviews.author: Fna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very small in size and not really worth the money but cute design
customer_reviews.author: robin ormsbee

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and niece both loved them for Easter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and niece both loved them for Easter. I didn’t read the description well BC it was smaller then I thought. Hatchanimals are small in size so I don’t know why I expected it to be much bigger. I would recommend for anyone to buy their kids who like Hatchanimals BC they are ones you can’t buy unless you get this basket.
customer_reviews.author: Mama bear 2012

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimals basket
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t run into this basket at my local target and thought it’d be nice and inexpensive to order for my daughter who loves hatchimals! She loved it!!

customer_reviews.title: Cool hatchimals inside
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, daughter thought the egg carton casing was cool! The hatchimals in this set seemed cuter!

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: super cute and the perfect easter basket for my hatchimal loving girl

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old granddaughter will be happy on Easter
customer_reviews.text: Included, 4 hatchimals, 2 animal tokens and 2 were just a cardboard picture of an animal. Whole basket fit in palm of an adults hand. Price is bit high but it is the average trending hatchimals cost. Basket was a bit smaller than anticipated. 4 year old granddaughter will be happy on Easter.
customer_reviews.author: Roadtripn42

customer_reviews.title: Fun on Easter
customer_reviews.text: These worked well. Granddaughter was very exhausted, and she was not disappointed with these eggs like her brother was with the dinosaur eggs from Blackjill.
customer_reviews.author: S. Caffery

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: "Bought it for my granddaughter for Easter and she wont put it down. She loves it! Its adorable.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for little girls to take with them to ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit at Easter for my friend's granddaughters. Perfect size for little girls to take with them to restaurants or visiting friends.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect Easter gift. My son enjoyed hatching the eggs.

customer_reviews.title: It was cute and perfect for Easter in its basket
customer_reviews.text: Oh My! This went into my granddaughter’s Easter basket. She is 5 and was so excited! I will get more later. It was cute and perfect for Easter in its basket!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Melson

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would have been bigger but this is a basket stuffer. Either way my niece will love it because of the name.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimals Spring Basket
customer_reviews.text: What every kid seems to want this Easter. This Basket comes with 4 hatch-able eggs. And a bonus two hatched Hatchimals and space for two more . This Basket Holds up to 8 Hatchimals Its adorable .. I like that this spring collection can be kept together in one basket . The color of the eggs are bright and the little hatchimals are so cute and sparkly .. This is a Easter winner .. Retail Value 19.99$ ..You can't go wrong with the Spring Basket Hatchimal Play set by Spin Master .. These are the new season of Hatchimals ..
customer_reviews.author: Barrieclark

customer_reviews.title: Too cute to pass up
customer_reviews.text: My youngest daughter is 2 years old and has no need for an actual easter basket but, if my older kids found out the easter bunny didnt bring her anything they would be devastated! I found this and for the price figured it would do just fine. Well, she loved it! She got such a kick.out of hatching the eggs and she carried the basket around for days filled with her little pets!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney "Mother of Plants" Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimals
customer_reviews.text: This is too cute. Very hard plastic from what I can tell (the basket). Has 6 hatchimals. The two you see in the background are just cardboard cut outs. No smell when opened. Bought as a gift for my daughter's best friend. My only issue with this entire package was it came in a bubble mailer...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Cute with Caution!!
customer_reviews.text: These little toys are very cute but are a chocking hazard to younger children. Be sure if the older kids are playing with these to not leave any of them laying around on the floor. Goodness forbid a crawling baby find these and put them into their mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this! She was happy because she got some toys her mother was happy because it didn’t take up a lot of room in her bedroom. It’s a win win all the way around! Everyone was happy with this item. I would buy this again for her she loves The hatchable‘s
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: Junk mid leading
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk. Waste of money I should go to hobby lobby. I am going to keep it as a stuffer but what a waste of $15.00

customer_reviews.title: 8yr Old Disapointed - No Rare or Ultra Rare
customer_reviews.text: 8yr Old Disapointed - No Rare or Ultra Rare. You should have a least one of them in here.
customer_reviews.author: EVsMOM

customer_reviews.title: what were they thinking
customer_reviews.text: The product is a pretty ditty as long as it remains packaged for a "Hatchable collector" a few years from now. I can not explain the disappointment for little item. Just know this cutie is not for a child yet to be reasoned with...tiny pieces to naked eye of an adult appears to be plastic....but looks like candy to a young child. Price not a problem but description needs to be upgraded to strict age of child who could enjoy the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Used as Easter present in basket for 5 year old daughter.She loves holding them in her hands to get them to hatch! Cute fuzzy ones are her favorite in this little basket!

customer_reviews.title: Toddler enjoyed cracking and peeling egg
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I purchased hatchimals. My daughter loved it. It was fun for her to crack open and peel. She enjoyed cracking and peeling it more than the little toy inside.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!!!

product_meta.title: Hatchimals CollEGGtibles Basket with 6 Hatchimals CollEGGtibles
product_meta.description: It’s a Hatchimals EGG-travaganza! Find six exclusive Hatchimals CollEGGtibles inside a colorful Basket! With four in-egg and two out-of-egg characters, there’s so many new friends to hatch and collect! These egg have a vibrant yellow to pink ombre finish, and a beautiful purple scalloped heart! To hatch, hold each egg in your hand, rub the purple heart until it changes color, then press down to crack the shell! Who will you hatch? These pastel-colored characters have a luminous pearly finish and glittery wings! Tuck your new friends into the Basket and carry them wherever you go!
feature_bullets: Hatch your CollEGGtibles, then peel your egg down to the wavy line at the bottom! Throw away the top pieces and now you have a cozy nest – the ideal place to display your adorable friend
Inside the Basket are six exclusive Hatchimals CollEGGtibles and 8 nests! That means there’s room for more of your friends! Now you can play and display your CollEGGtibles
Hatchimals Basket is for kids aged 5+. Material: Plastic

MAKE EASTER MEMORABLE: Ombre eggs! Pastel colours! Exclusive characters! There’s so much hatchifun inside the Basket! With four in-egg and two out-of-egg characters, it’s the perfect edition to your collection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,133 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
